contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Radio station | name = XHVIR (FM) XERPV (AM) | image = | city = [[Ciudad Victoria]], [[Tamaulipas]], [[Mexico]] | area = [[Ciudad Victoria]], | branding = La Cotorra | slogan = | airdate = | frequency = 101.7 FM<br>1340 AM | format = Mexican | power = | erp = | class = | callsign_meaning = | former_callsigns = | owner = | webcast = | website = www.ort.com.mx | affiliations = }} '''XHVIR''' and '''XERPV''' (branded as La Cotorra) are two [[Mexico|Mexican]] regional radio stations that the serve [[Ciudad Victoria]], [[Tamaulipas]], [[Mexico]] market area with the same programming. <br clear=all> {{Ciudad Victoria Radio}} {{Mexico-radio-station-stub}} {{coord missing|Mexico}} [[Category:Regional Mexican radio stations]] [[Category:Spanish-language radio stations]] [[Category:Radio stations in Ciudad Victoria]]
